title: [Northern Mountains, Timberline]
description: The trail meanders and curves, dancing around the feet of trees that grow more substantial the higher one climbs.  Above, an opening in the branch cover allows light to reach a number of dogwood trees huddling in the small clearing.  An immense giant of a pine stands staunchly to the north, its feet and lower branches forcing the path to sneak past by veering southwest.

The trail meanders and curves, dancing around the feet of trees that grow more substantial the higher one climbs. An immense giant of a pine stands staunchly to the north, its feet and lower branches forcing the path to sneak past by veering southwest.
